faq.question: What is the difference between JSON formatting and validation?
faq.answer: JSON formatting makes the structure readable with proper indentation, while validation checks if the syntax follows JSON standards. This tool does both simultaneously.

faq.question: Is my JSON data secure when using this tool?
faq.answer: Yes, all processing happens locally in your browser. No data is sent to any server or stored anywhere.

faq.question: Can I format large JSON files?
faq.answer: Yes, but very large files (>10MB) might slow down your browser. Consider breaking them into smaller chunks if needed.
